chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

q: nat

Hl: 0 < l
Hlq: l + 1 < q
Hq: 1 <= q
Hq': 0 < 4 * q
r: nat
Hr': 4 <= r
Hr: 2 <= r
Hl'': 2 * l < r
u1: nat
u: nat
Hu: u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) r)
Hu1: u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) r)
w: nat
u2: nat
H18: 1 + (r - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) r
H19: u * u = u1 + u2
k: nat
f: nat -> nat
Hf1: forall i : nat, i < l -> 2 * f i < k
Hf2: forall i j : nat, i < j < l -> f i < f j
j2: nat
i2: nat
j1: nat
i1: nat

Goal:
j1 <= i1 < l -> j2 <= i2 < l -> f i1 + f j1 = f i2 + f j2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal Init.Nat.mul 1)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
Tauto.X : ?TX ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
Tauto.N : Tauto.GFormula ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
Tauto.FF : Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [l : nat q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r Hl'' : 2 * l < r u : nat u1 : nat Hu : u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) r) Hu1 : u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) w := ∑ (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => power i r) : nat u2 := ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) : nat H18 : 1 + (r - 1)...
VarMap.Elt : ?A ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.PEX : BinNums.positive ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.PEc : ?C ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.PEsub : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
EnvRing.PEmul : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C ->...-> f i < f j i1 : nat j1 : nat i2 : nat j2 : nat |- Type]
VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [l : nat q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r Hl'' : 2 * l < r u : nat u1 : nat Hu : u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) r) Hu1 : u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) w := ∑ (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => power i r) : nat u2 := ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) : nat H18 : 1 + (r - 1)...
double_sum_powers_ortho : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> f i j < r) -> (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 < i1 < n -> j2 < i2 < n -> e i1 j1 = e i2 j2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r)) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r))
all_ones_dio : forall r : nat, 2 <= r -> forall l w : nat, w = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r) < -> 1 + (r - 1) * w = power l r
const_u2_meet : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> 2 * k < k' -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i = power (S i) 2) -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) r))
all_ones_equation : forall r : nat, 2 <= r -> forall l : nat, 1 + (r - 1) * ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r) = power l r
power_inj_2 : forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 < i1 -> j2 < i2 -> power i1 2 + power j1 2 = power i2 2 + power j2 2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2
const_u1_prefix : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> {q : nat | q <= m /\ u * u ⇣ w = ∑ q (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) r)}
power_decomp.power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
Hseq_u : forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> forall a : nat, a <= m -> ∑ a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) r) = msum nat_join 0 a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) r)
Hu2_w : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) r)) ⇣ w = 0
sum_2_power_2_injective : forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 <= i1 -> j2 <= i2 -> power i1 2 + power j1 2 = power i2 2 + power j2 2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2
power_decomp.sum_2_power_2_injective : forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 <= i1 -> j2 <= i2 -> power i1 2 + power j1 2 = power i2 2 + power j2 2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2
const_u1_meet : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> 2 * k < k' -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ w < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) r)
const_u1_eq : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> 2 * k < k' -> u * u ⇣ w = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) r)
sum_power_binary_lt : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r)
sum_power_binary_lt_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> exists a : nat -> nat, m = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2)
const_1.Hu1 : forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) r) = msum nat_join 0 m (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) r)
const_u_square : forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> u * u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) r) + ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) r))
sum_powers_injective : forall (r n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (m : nat) (g : nat -> nat), 2 <= r -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> g i < g j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (g i) r) -> n = m /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i)
Hg1 : forall (m k : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (Hf1 : forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) (Hf2 : forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j), ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) r)) = ∑ (2 * k) (fun i : nat => 2 * proj1_sig (g_full f Hf1 Hf2) i * power i r)
sum_powers_ortho : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> e i = e j -> i = j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r)
g_full : forall (m k : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> {g : nat -> nat | ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => power (f i + f j) r)) = ∑ (2 * k) (fun i : nat => g i * power i r) /\ (forall i : nat, g i <= m)}
sum_powers_binary_le_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = ∑ k (fun i : nat => g i * power (e (h i)) r) /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
meet_sum_powers : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f g e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) ⇣ ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i ⇣ g i * power (e i) r)

```
